name: Snowmania (itch)
description:
Snowman Shootin' Game

Tap or click to aim and shoot your cannon!

Fend off the hordes of snowmen as long as possible!

Your cannon will upgrade every 20 seconds and every time you reach score milestones!

Look for presents!!!

Made for Weekly Game Jab Week 228 with the theme - "Snowball" with the intent to make a charming winter-themed game and work on my graphics a little bit :)
